observationEncounterSearchParameter

Parameter encounter:token

Searches for observations by the observation encounter eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?encounter.type={type}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: observationEncounterSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations by the observation encounter eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?encounter.type={type}
